articles.title: Instagram Adds 'Recently Deleted' Folder to Safeguard Against Mistaken Post Removal - Social Media Today
articles.description: Instagram's adding a new 'Recently Deleted' folder to all accounts, ensuring that users can restore deleted posts for up to 30 days.
